Gradient™ AI Inference Cloud Whether you’re training large models, running inference, or creating AI-driven applications, Gradient™ AI enables you to build, deploy, and scale with ease. Get started Learn more Deploy OpenClaw on DigitalOcean DigitalOcean offers two ways to run OpenClaw, depending on how you want to deploy and operate your assistant. You can use the 1-Click Deploy OpenClaw for a fast, self-contained VM-based setup, or the App Platform template for a container-native deployment with private access and built-in operational consistency. Learn how Enterprise-grade infrastructure trusted by 600K+ customers running AI inference, serving thousands of requests, and executing every big idea in between. Customers growing with DigitalOcean See how developers and startups around the globe are building and scaling their applications on DigitalOcean while saving money. conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Emily and I'm a Sales Development Representative at DeepData AI. I came across your company, and I was impressed with the work you're doing in the AI space. I'd love to introduce you to our data processing solution that can help optimize your AI workflows. Can you tell me a little bit about your current data processing infrastructure?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (sighs) Look, we're already using DigitalOcean for our AI inference cloud, and it's working just fine for us. I'm not sure we need another solution. What makes DeepData AI so special?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand your skepticism, but our solution is designed to complement existing infrastructure, not replace it. DeepData AI provides advanced data processing capabilities that can help reduce latency, increase throughput, and improve overall model accuracy. We've seen significant performance gains with our existing customers who use DigitalOcean. Would you be open to exploring how our solution can integrate with your current setup?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (hesitant) I suppose it couldn't hurt to learn more. But I have to warn you, we're very cost-sensitive. We've worked hard to optimize our costs on DigitalOcean, and I'm not sure we can justify adding another expense. What kind of pricing are we talking about?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand your concerns about cost. Our pricing is tiered, and we offer a free trial to help you evaluate the value of our solution. We've also worked with other companies in the AI space who have seen significant ROI from using our solution. In fact, one of our customers saw a 30% reduction in data processing costs after implementing DeepData AI. Would you be willing to discuss your current data processing pain points and see if our solution can address them?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (still skeptical) Okay, fine. We do have some issues with data bottlenecking during peak hours. But I'm not sure I want to add another vendor to our stack. What kind of support and integration resources do you offer to make sure this wouldn't be a headache for our team?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: We take integration and support very seriously. We offer dedicated onboarding support, as well as ongoing technical support and regular check-ins to ensure our solution is meeting your needs. We've also developed pre-built integrations with popular AI platforms, including DigitalOcean, to make it easy to get started. I'd be happy to provide a detailed overview of our support and integration process if you're interested.
